author: George Glover
title: Stock Futures Slip With Trade Talks Still in Focus
description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq are also pointing down before the market opens. Treasury yields are lower, Bitcoin is rising.
content:
Stocks were headed for mild losses on Tuesday as investors shied away from making any major moves ahead of a second day of trade talks between China and the U.S.
